famousQuotes.name: Albert Einstein
famousQuotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

famousQuotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi
famousQuotes.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

famousQuotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.
famousQuotes.quote: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.

famousQuotes.name: Nelson Mandela
famousQuotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

famousQuotes.name: Steve Jobs
famousQuotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

famousQuotes.name: Mother Teresa
famousQuotes.quote: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.

famousQuotes.name: Walt Disney
famousQuotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

famousQuotes.name: Oscar Wilde
famousQuotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

famousQuotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci
famousQuotes.quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.

famousQuotes.name: Thomas Edison
famousQuotes.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

famousQuotes.name: Benjamin Franklin
famousQuotes.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.

famousQuotes.name: Confucius
famousQuotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

famousQuotes.name: Mark Twain
famousQuotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

famousQuotes.name: Aristotle
famousQuotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

famousQuotes.name: William Shakespeare
famousQuotes.quote: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.

famousQuotes.name: Abraham Lincoln
famousQuotes.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.

famousQuotes.name: Buddha
famousQuotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.

famousQuotes.name: Isaac Newton
famousQuotes.quote: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants.

famousQuotes.name: Plato
famousQuotes.quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.

famousQuotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson
famousQuotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

famousQuotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche
famousQuotes.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.

famousQuotes.name: John F. Kennedy
famousQuotes.quote: Ask not what your country can do for you—ask what you can do for your country.

famousQuotes.name: Winston Churchill
famousQuotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

famousQuotes.name: George Bernard Shaw
famousQuotes.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

famousQuotes.name: Socrates
famousQuotes.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

famousQuotes.name: Voltaire
famousQuotes.quote: I disapprove of what you say, but I will defend to the death your right to say it.

famousQuotes.name: Henry Ford
famousQuotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.

famousQuotes.name: Elon Musk
famousQuotes.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

famousQuotes.name: Bill Gates
famousQuotes.quote: It's fine to celebrate success, but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.

famousQuotes.name: Albert Camus
famousQuotes.quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.

famousQuotes.name: Carl Sagan
famousQuotes.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

famousQuotes.name: Bruce Lee
famousQuotes.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.

famousQuotes.name: J.K. Rowling
famousQuotes.quote: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

famousQuotes.name: Helen Keller
famousQuotes.quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.

famousQuotes.name: Malala Yousafzai
famousQuotes.quote: One child, one teacher, one book, one pen can change the world.

famousQuotes.name: Marie Curie
famousQuotes.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared; it is only to be understood.

famousQuotes.name: Jane Austen
famousQuotes.quote: It isn't what we say or think that defines us, but what we do.

famousQuotes.name: Stephen Hawking
famousQuotes.quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.

famousQuotes.name: Rosa Parks
famousQuotes.quote: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.

famousQuotes.name: Elon Musk
famousQuotes.quote: Persistence is very important. You should not give up unless you are forced to give up.

famousQuotes.name: Amelia Earhart
famousQuotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.

famousQuotes.name: Maya Angelou
famousQuotes.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

famousQuotes.name: Nelson Mandela
famousQuotes.quote: I never lose. I either win or learn.

famousQuotes.name: Albert Einstein
famousQuotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

famousQuotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt
famousQuotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.

famousQuotes.name: John Lennon
famousQuotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

famousQuotes.name: Dalai Lama
famousQuotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

famousQuotes.name: Yoda
famousQuotes.quote: Do or do not, there is no try.
